SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Client
The Client class represents a client that can interact with a server through a socket connection.
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler class implements the Runnable interface and handles incoming client connections to the server.
ClientLauncher
The ClientLauncher class launches a client to bind to a specific server port and starts its execution.
ClientLauncher
The ClientLauncher class launches a client to bind to a specific server port and starts its execution.
Course
The Course class represents a course in the academic system.
EventHandler
A functional interface for handling events received by the server.
RegistrationForm
A serializable class representing a registration form for a course.
Server
This class represents a server that listens on a specified port for incoming client requests.
ServerLauncher
The ServerLauncher class launches a server on a specified port and starts its execution.
Student
The Student class represents a student in the academic system.
